definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
see 體格檢查|体格检查[ti3 ge2 jian3 cha2]
Disciplinary Committee of Chinese Communist Party
pinyin: Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Ji4 lu:4 Jian3 cha2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中共中央紀律檢查委員會

definition: slide examination/microscopic examination of thin section of specimen as part of biopsy

pinyin: zhan1 ran3 cheng2 du4 jian3 cha2 yi2

definition: biopsy/abbr. to 活檢|活检[huo2 jian3]
pinyin: huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2

definition: sudden unannounced investigation/on-the-spot inspection/to search without notification
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP
pinyin: Ji4 lu:4 Jian3 cha2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: No suspected cancer cells or cancer cells were found.
sentences.chinese: 宮頸刮片檢查兩組均未查見可疑癌細胞或癌細胞。

sentences.english: I consent to take any pre-employment physical examination required by the Company.
sentences.chinese: 本人願意接受公司要求的職前體格檢查。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲檢查在卵泡膜細胞瘤診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Unplug the jack carefully examined, D-type socket pin bends whether or Broken Needle?
sentences.chinese: 拔下插口仔細檢查，D型插口中是否有彎針或斷針？

sentences.english: Investigations led to the diagnosis and treatment of subclavian artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 檢查明確鎖骨下動脈狹窄的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: What is the importance of the test of related substances for antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 試述抗生素藥物有關物質檢查的意義？

sentences.english: Endoscopic ultrasonography and computerized tomography demonstrated the lesion to be a cyst in nature.
sentences.chinese: 內視鏡超音波與電腦斷層檢查也證明此病竈爲囊狀物。

sentences.english: Men also receive health education and testing that could save their life.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏男士還接受一些可以救命的健康教育和檢查。

sentences.english: "I would suggest they got a cholesterol test with these symptoms, " says Smith.
sentences.chinese: 有這此症狀的人，我會建議他們去檢查一下膽固醇。

sentences.english: Each time experiment was performed, he would check and recheck the results obtained.
sentences.chinese: 每次做實驗時，他總是對所獲得的結果檢查兩遍。

sentences.english: How long will it take us to get through the customs.
sentences.chinese: 通過海關檢查要多長時間。

sentences.english: Doppler ultrasound is part of the echocardiogram test.
sentences.chinese: 也是超聲波心動圖檢查的一個部分。

sentences.english: To assess the effectiveness of cardiac compressions during adult cardiopulmonary resuscitation, the nurse should palpate which pulse site?
sentences.chinese: 心肺復甦時，評估按壓的有效性，應檢查哪處的脈搏？

sentences.english: MethodsBoth eyes of 68 children with leukocoria were examined with CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 方法對68例兒童白瞳症患者進行雙眼CT掃描檢查。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT OBJECTIVE:To determine the value of color Doppler ultrasound examination in diagnosis of testis and epididymis diseases.
sentences.chinese: 探討彩色多普勒超聲檢查診斷睾丸附睾疾病的價值。

sentences.english: They should always be examined carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你應該經常小心地做好檢查。

definition: to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
to doubt (sth)/to be skeptical of/to have one's doubts/to harbor suspicions/to suspect that
